Subject: 48 hour license key.
Description: The button to "Download 48H Assessment License" for PingCastle has disappeared from the My Products page. The option was there previously. We use that license when running the tool at client sites. Can you please re-add the button?
What_We_Know__c:
Customer wants to create the 48hs license - Explained that the option is accessible via the portal. 
There was an issue in portal, fixed by web team

Solution_Comment__c: There was an issue with the portal. Web team fixed it
